New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr. became the second player since 1900 to hit a grand slam and steal three bases in a single game
Key Match Events: Chisholm Jr. hit a grand slam in the bottom of the eighth inning
Chisholm Jr. stole three bases during the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jake Burger hit a go-ahead two-run homer
Matt Olson hit his major league-leading 52nd homer
